sentences.english: Objective To further discuss the indexes which can be used to objectively appraise the rat myocardial ischemia models.
sentences.chinese: 目的進一步探討客觀評價大鼠心肌缺血模型的指標。

sentences.english: Objective To treat acute myocardial infarction with cardiogenic shock by emegency PCI.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性心肌梗死合併心源性休克的搶救方法。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the damage effect of inhalation carbon disulfide on immunological cells of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討二硫化碳染毒對小鼠心肌細胞凋亡的影響。

sentences.english: The virus triggered myocarditis, a serious inflammation of the heart muscle.
sentences.chinese: 這些病毒引發心肌炎，對心臟肌肉造成嚴重的炎症。

sentences.english: What is the symptom of heart myositis?
Objective Explore the biochemical mechanism of actions of Jiangguiyin capsules against myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究薑桂飲膠囊抗心肌缺血的生化機理。

sentences.english: Nimodipine could prevent the calcium overload in ischemic myocyte.
sentences.chinese: 尼莫地平能阻止缺血心肌細胞鈣超載的發展和加重。

sentences.english: Study on viable myocardium is one of the hot issues in modern cardiology.
sentences.chinese: 存活心肌的研究是目前心臟病學的研究熱點之一。

sentences.english: To evaluate the clinical factors that affect the prognosis of peripartum cardiomyopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價影響圍產期心肌病預後的臨牀因素。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the toxicity effects of aconitine on neonatal rat cardiomyocytes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究烏頭鹼對乳鼠心肌細胞的毒性作用。

sentences.english: Heart myositis and lobar anxiety patient are sensitive to strong heart glucoside, should notice dosage.
sentences.chinese: 心肌炎及肺心病患者對強心甙敏感，應注意用量。

sentences.english: Objective:To develop the calcium overload model with adult rat ventricular cardiomyocytes.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討建立成年大鼠心肌細胞鈣超載模型的方法。

sentences.english: Infarct size was determined by TTC staining method.
sentences.chinese: TTC染色法檢測心肌梗死麪積。

sentences.english: To reconstruct the 3-dimensioanal image of heart and the region of myocardial ischemia from 2-dimensioanal tomogram of electron beam CT (EBCT).
sentences.chinese: 研究電子束CT心肌梗死部位及形態的三維圖象重建。

sentences.english: It is well established that the cardial contraction is initiated when an action potential depolarizes the sarcolemma.
sentences.chinese: 已經確證，心肌收縮始於動作電位使肌膜去極化。

sentences.english: The bovine hearts blocked at the left anterior descending artery for 45 minutes are made as an ischemic model.
sentences.chinese: 阻斷牛心臟前降支動脈45分鐘作爲缺血心肌模型。
